languages.text: {n}Он косится на свиток с пометками в механической кисти-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланте{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} Фиделио? Все гости прибыли, вы последн{mf|ий|яя} в списке, и без вас, уж конечно, мы не могли начать. Ваше присутствие совершенно необходимо!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Он косится на свиток с пометками в механической кисти-импланте.{/n} "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} Фиделио? Все гости прибыли, вы последн{mf|ий|яя} в списке, и без вас, уж конечно, мы не могли начать. Ваше присутствие совершенно необходимо!"

languages.text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он косится на свиток с пометками в механической кисти-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланте{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} Фиделио? Все гости прибыли, вы последн{mf|ий|яя} в списке, и без вас, уж конечно, мы не могли начать. Ваше присутствие совершенно необходимо!"

traits.locale_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand implant.{/n} "{mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio? All guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely necessary!"

{n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand implant.{/n} "{mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio? All guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely necessary!"

{n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand implant.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

{n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand implant.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

{n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

languages.text: {n}他瞥了一眼{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入{/g}的机械手，看了看手中的卷轴。{/n}“菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，是吧？所有的客人都到齐了，你是名单上最后的成员。如果你不在，我们就没办法开始。你的到来至关重要！”
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他瞥了一眼{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入{/g}的机械手，看了看手中的卷轴。{/n}“菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，是吧？所有的客人都到齐了，你是名单上最后的成员。如果你不在，我们就没办法开始。你的到来至关重要！”

languages.text: {n}Echa un vistazo al pergamino que lleva en su mano mecánica {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantada{/g}.{/n} «¿{mf|Maestro|Maestra} Fidelio? Todos los invitados han llegado ya; solo quedaba usted, pero no podíamos empezar hasta que llegara. ¡Su presencia es imprescindible!».
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Echa un vistazo al pergamino que lleva en su mano mecánica {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantada{/g}.{/n} «¿{mf|Maestro|Maestra} Fidelio? Todos los invitados han llegado ya; solo quedaba usted, pero no podíamos empezar hasta que llegara. ¡Su presencia es imprescindible!».

languages.text: {n}彼は機械の手に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}のリストに目をやった。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオでしょうか？参加者は全員揃いました。あなたはリストの最後に記載されていますが、あなた抜きでは始められません。あなたは絶対に必要なのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は機械の手に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}のリストに目をやった。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオでしょうか？参加者は全員揃いました。あなたはリストの最後に記載されていますが、あなた抜きでは始められません。あなたは絶対に必要なのです！」

languages.text: {n}Er betrachtet die Schriftrolle in seinem mechanischen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Handimplantat{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio? Alle Gäste sind eingetroffen, nur Ihr steht noch auf der Liste, und ohne Euch können wir nicht anfangen. Eure Anwesenheit ist absolut unverzichtbar!"
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er betrachtet die Schriftrolle in seinem mechanischen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Handimplantat{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio? Alle Gäste sind eingetroffen, nur Ihr steht noch auf der Liste, und ohne Euch können wir nicht anfangen. Eure Anwesenheit ist absolut unverzichtbar!"

languages.text: {n}Il parcourt des yeux le parchemin qu'il tient dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} mécanique qui lui sert de main.{/n} « {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} Fidélio ? Tous les invités sont arrivés, vous êtes {mf|le dernier|la dernière} sur la liste. Nous vous attendions pour commencer. Après tout, votre présence est indispensable ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il parcourt des yeux le parchemin qu'il tient dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} mécanique qui lui sert de main.{/n} « {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} Fidélio ? Tous les invités sont arrivés, vous êtes {mf|le dernier|la dernière} sur la liste. Nous vous attendions pour commencer. Après tout, votre présence est indispensable ! »

languages.text: {n}Mekanik el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantıyla{/g} tuttuğu tomara bakıyor.{/n} "Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}? Tüm misafirlerimiz geldi. Listedeki son kişisiniz, siz olmadan başlayamazdık. Burada olmanız ziyadesiyle önemli!"
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at the scroll in his mechanical hand {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio? All the guests have arrived, you're the last on the list, and we couldn't well start without you. Your presence is absolutely vital!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekanik el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantıyla{/g} tuttuğu parşömene bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio? Tüm misafirlerimiz geldi. Listedeki son kişisiniz, siz olmadan başlamak istemedik. Burada olmanız ziyadesiyle önemli!"
